title: NYC: not an accident
author: VD
content_html: The car that hit pedestrians, killed one and injured 20 in Times Square doesn’t look like so much like an accident now. The driver clearly wasn’t an old man or woman with a medical condition; he’s being arrested below. Video link.
content_text:
The car that hit pedestrians, killed one and injured 20 in Times Square doesn’t look like so much like an accident now. The driver clearly wasn’t an old man or woman with a medical condition; he’s being arrested below.
